mapper.select: SELECT SEQUSERINFO ,ID ,PASSWD ,DATE_FORMAT(CREATEDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CREATEDATE ,DATE_FORMAT(UPDATEDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPDATEDATE ,DATE_FORMAT(DELETEDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS DELETEDATE FROM USERINFO WHERE 1=1 AND ID = #{id} AND PASSWD = PASSWORD(#{password})
